title: Arcade for Airways
description: This site, along with others listed under client work are created using input from myself and various subject matter experts. I do not take full credit for them (unlike the designs listed under design work). This work is not a product of sheer creativity or skill, it's a product of great teamwork, patience, trust and communication.

title: Polytainers
description: I worked on this website as a secondary developer with my team lead. It was a nice sized project with unique elements that feature their products nicely.

title: Jamco Mechanical
description: This website highlights Jamco's business, services and products. The website also features a gallery of work completed along with testimonials from satisfied customers. It features a simple, straight forward design with the focus on answering customer questions efficiently.

title: B-N-C Plumbing Company
description: Small business website focused on conveying important information for potential customers. The website features various section including about, services, products and promotions.
